message:
{
    "name": "Gibbons–Maeda–Garfinkle–Horowitz–Strominger (GMGHS) spacetime metric",
    "abbrev": "gmgshs",
    "description": "A four-dimensional spacetime metric describing the gravitational pull of a black hole with a negative cosmological constant, exhibiting a novel phase structure and holographic properties.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": true,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Schwarzschild-like",
            "xlineElement": "(-2*M*r^2 + (1 - 2*M/r - λ*r^2)^(-1))*dt^2 + (1 - 2*M/r - λ*r^2)*(dr^2 + r^2*dθ^2 + r^2*sin^2(θ)*dφ^2)",
            "validated": false,
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
